Abnormal buildup of uromodulin may trigger the self-destruction (apoptosis) of cells in the kidneys, causing progressive kidney disease.",GHR,uromodulin-associated kidney disease
Is uromodulin-associated kidney disease inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene
